name: Elf-san's Quest
description:
This is Bullet hell 2D-Shmup where you control an Elf-san and defeat monsters.

-Seven stages and eight bosses.

-Can choose between a casual, fun mode and a more advanced, difficult mode.

-Simple control with only shot and slow move.

-And chiptune sounds like 8bit. All these sounds were created by myself for the first time!

(Some text in the game is in Japanese but probably not a problem to play.)

[Control(Can be changed in game)]

-Move Arrows/L-stick/POV

-Shot Z key/A button (hold)

-Slow move C key/X button (hold)
